website_summaries.verdict: Enjoy all the quality of a classic decanter set with a fun, modern twist.
pros: Classic decanter set has a fun, modern design
The glass is thick with plenty of flat surfaces, making it ideal for personal engravings
The quality, aesthetically pleasing packaging make this set an excellent gift idea
cons: Set sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Defects in glass.  I wish the presentation matched the material.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this set judging by the gleaming reviews. I was impressed by the presentation and packaging. Unfortunately, upon opening it I immediately noticed defects in the glasses. Pretty unexpected at this price point. Needless to say I'm disappointed and would recommend looking elsewhere. Update: So I contacted support and was told this was normal and expected. Really? I have been to waterford crystal in Ireland and can tell you first hand crystal doesn't have bubbles normally! What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: rj124104

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves his beautiful new decanter set! I got it for him for our 15th wedding Anniversary since the traditional gift for 15 years of marriage is crystal. It was beautifully packaged, nothing was broken or cracked. Love it! ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Ms. O

customer_reviews.title: The One to Get!
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework on these; this is definitely theset to get! From the packaging/gift perspective it’s a 10. From quality and value, also a 10. No one paid me for this review, it is just a great set and terrific value. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I must say for $99 getting this beautiful crystal decanter and 4 matching crystal glasses is an exceptional value! The case the set come in is also exceptional and would be excellent if the intent is as a gift. The glasses are perfect in size to hold a 21⁄2" ice ball if so desired and and are quite heavy /robust. The decanter and the stopper are very clear and as robust as the glasses with this set. For the price this is a very good deal and needs to be considered if one is looking for a high quality crystal decanter for spirits (Bourbon in my case).
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery S. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: We were looking for something like this to give as a gift and I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something like this to give as a gift and I can't say enough good things about this set. First, cheers to Amazon getting it to us next day with free shipping.... Now to the set. First when you see the box it comes in you're already thinking this is going to be something special. Everything is packed excellent in the very solid and good looking box. The set its self is VERY classy and elegant. It just feels good in your hand. The glasses are thick and heavy as they should be. The decanter is as well and the stopper fits tight and right. This is a great set! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dransfield

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Although the design is lovely the glass is chunky and does not give the appearance of fine glassware. The packing was poor with only one air cushion and one corner of the box and over box was torn. The clear plastic wrap was loose and looked as if perhaps it was a returned item. The decanter and glasses were not damaged and since the recipient liked the design we kept it. If it was someone other than my husband I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: sandra cannon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design of the decanter and the packaging was nice. But the quality was horrible. Every glass had multiple air bubbles and the set looked dirty. After washing it looked somewhat better but the air bubbles will always bother me.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My bf had been mentioning he wanted to get into whiskey so I thought a decanter set would be a perfect Christmas gift. I found this one on amazon for a reasonable price and it had great reviews. The set is stunning and looks elegant yet manly sitting on the shelf of my bf’s apartment. The only thing missing is a little tray to display it on which we bought separately. I’m really pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone looking for a thoughtful and special gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband for Father’s Day. He is an active duty Marine and has been looking for the right decanter for years. I finally found this one and everything about it screamed my husband. Including the fact that Iron Man used these identical whisky glasses!!! He was absolutely smitten! The presentation was on point as well. My husband instantly assumed I spent an arm and a leg. I definitely recommend as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Agustin

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this set and this company.
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a crystal decanter set for my bourbon but I didn't think I could get this quality for this price. Loved the set and presentation when I received it. Having found a tiny flaw in the decanter, I sent an Email to the seller and got a response in less than two hours. Though the flaw was small, they insisted on replacing the decanter immediately. MTM customer service was awesome, Thanks Lisa. Ill be keeping my eye on your other products as the holidays arrive and happily recommend you to friends.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Coats

customer_reviews.title: The set is stunning and it comes in a box that is beautiful as well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Art Deco Whiskey Decanter set for a gift. When it came it had a slight flaw in a glass. I emailed the customer care and had a response within an hour and a complete whole set within 3 days. The set is stunning and it comes in a box that is beautiful as well. The recipient was thrilled...I would certainly recommend the product and the company!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle/Michael Ommen

customer_reviews.title: Loved the look and presentation
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift for my husband. He loved it! Loved the look and the box it was sent in. The Only thing he had to do was wash everything before using but that’s a usual practice for anything new you are eating or drinking from. Overall, I was pleased with how quickly it arrived and the design of the items and the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Makes A Nice Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my husband and he loves it. It makes an impressive gift for any whisky/ bourbon drinker. I’ve been looking for a set like this for quite some time and I’m very happy I chose this one. The packaging / box it comes in is elegant and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order does not match description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item twice and the order did not match the description each time. Instead of 5 pieces I received 2 glasses. Now I have to mail both boxes back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Well made. Wonderful packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend's birthday. He is so hard to shop for and so particular. But he LOVED it. Everything was packaged snugly and arrived safe! I absolutely love the craftsmanship and the weight and thickness of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Toll

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece, just tell the packets to clean them first.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would have dusted the piece before they packet it. It really took alot out of the presentation. I was disappointed because it was a gift, but after I washed it, it is absolutely gorgeous, extremely well packed. You could see there was great care put into it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - well worth the money spent.  Quality product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely gorgeous. the photos don't do this product justice. i got it for a friend for his 40th birthday and to say that he loved it, would be an understatement. the entire set is wonderful in every aspect, from the second you open the box all the way down to the weight and feel of the glass in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: KikiHoops

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to give this as a gift and when he opened it up, it was very anti-climactic.... the way it’s displayed in the box is beautiful. Once we took the set out though, it was Pretty...dirty. The decanter and glasses looked so cloudy and dirty. We were pretty bummed out. Its beautiful and nothing we can’t clean out. But to know that I paid for a dirty set is just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the set. I love the nice style and weight of the glasses and the decanter is top notch. I will be very proud showing my new set off at the next dinner party I host.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Leal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with this decanter set. The only issue that he mentioned and I noticed is that the glasses and decanter are visibly dirty. I’m not sure if it was just the set that I received but it does takes away from whether or not “gift-able”. The glasses and decanter are study and well made, so overall I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garzarelli

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous. I bought this for myself but I would’ve been so proud to give this beautifully crafted piece as a gift to a very special individual or couple. No disappointments.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Stately!
customer_reviews.text: This set certainly looks good. The presentation of the set in the box was of high caliber, would definitely recommend as a gift. The box itself was pretty sturdy with the items in cutouts of virtually solid foam. If the box was mishandled during the shipping process, due to the packaging I don't believe there would be any cause for alarm. The glassware is in there solid. The stopper for the decanter was a little wobbly, but I eventually found the sweet spot where it would sit firmly. The glasses have a good solid heft and feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Endress

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend absolutely loves this decanter set. He tells me literally everytime we drink from them while gushing over how classy he feels sipping from the glasses! They are stunning, simple, sleek and modern. We are currently enjoying a very special small batch bourbon called The Saint from Saint Augustine Distillery from the decanter now. One of the glasses came in with a slight chip and the seller was on top of checking on us about the purchase anyways, and swiftly sent us 2 new glasses within 2 days of notifiying them of the damage. Very good communication from Maketh The Man and an exceptional product. Thank you for adding to our home decor and spirit drinking experience! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sami Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Although there a few few bubbles in the glasses, this is a very heavy and beautiful set. My boyfriend loves it and uses the glasses all the time even for non alcoholic drinks. It’s just a very nicely weighted set. The storage box and package it came in was also impressive. You will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Lien

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this set as a wedding gift to a very good friend of mine, the presentation of the box it comes in is very impressive. Craftsmanship is about what you would expect considering the price: they have good weight to them, there are a few small defects in the crystal but nothing terrible. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tylor Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well made!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this came very well packaged in a really awesome box as shown in the pictures. No way was it going to break during shipment! Nice for storing the set when not in use. Very attractive, solid and heavy set. Nice glass on glass topper. Nothing cheap about its appearance. If searching for a nice gift for someone this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicsen33

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’s crystal
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great set. It is crystal. We had it engraved to give as a gift and it turned out better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chocoleon

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: “Arrived as promised in a beautiful box and the decanter and glasses are packed well. I love the simple yet elegant design of the decanter and glasses, it is exactly what I was looking for. The crystal is beautiful and they have a good weight! I bought this as a gift and I have no doubt the person will love it!!”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend very much!
customer_reviews.text: Just a gorgeous item. Highly recommend. Luxury feeling from the weight of the cut crystal. Perfect for a gift or yourself at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: iHeardUsayTacos

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. Very durable glass. A glass Bourbon should be drank out of. Comes with beautiful gift box. Very cool set. Nothing to dislike from this viewer.
customer_reviews.author: maudie lucas

customer_reviews.title: Classic and beautiful! Just a minor flaw in glass
customer_reviews.text: Packaged beautifully. A little cloudy but sparkles beautifully when wiped down. One glass has small “string” of bubbles that’s pretty noticeable, and there are a couple of tiny bubbles on another two glasses. Because this is a gift I’d like the one replaced. Otherwise it really is a simple, yet substantial classic set. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: blmwilkenson

customer_reviews.title: EVERY MAN NEEDS ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it! This decanter set was the perfect anniversary gift! Definitely makes a statement in his masculine, cigar lounge theme mancave. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Set is great but box was ripped and card had something on it.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses themselves are great but the outer white slider for the box was torn when I received it. There is also a card that came with it that informs you about the product; appeared to have yellow-greenish glue on it... at least I hope it was just glue... Would buy again but I would hope it would be a bit more presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Spade

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. It’s rare but the packaging set the stage for this gift to my husband for Father’s Day. He is not a serious drinker but occasionally loves a good aged Chivas. The glass craftsmanship is very masculine but the packaging is so stately and masculine that it was just an incredible gift to open. Made the purchase worthwhile and so awesome. He was so happy with part of his Father’s Day Gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janette LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous decanter set w/ no imperfections. The glass on glass seal of the decanter is perfect and it arrived in 2 days with Prime as expected (even during the busy season). Also, the 'Maketh the Man' packaging is so well constructed that I doubt it would have broken in transit even if dropped! It will make a very classy gift that I cannot wait to bestow on its intended owner.
customer_reviews.author: msLoribell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the set. There was a chip and they shipped a new set to us. Excellent customer service via email too. It is heavy and feels like I imgained a whiskey glass should, the craftmanshipis excellen. The packaging is beautiful too. I would reccomend this company anytime.
customer_reviews.author: lenreya burke

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and they are absolutely stunning! I did not expect this level of quality for the price. They are beautiful! I also love the way they packaged them. They come in this gorgeous box that alone has such an amazing presentation. I've been recommmending these glasses to all of our friends. I've been looking for nic, lead-free crystal whiskey glasses for awhile, and these are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unique gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband this past Christmas and I am very happy with the purchase. He loved it! It is classic looking and very durable. I love the box it came in, very sturdy and great presentation. I also bought him some nice Scotch and the whiskey stones to go with but if you are looking for a unique gift for your significant other that appreciates fine things, this is a nice way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing packaging! Has a great feel to them, very hefty, would definitely buy again. A great addition to any man cave. ✌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift or for yourself! Really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is very well done, and everything is nicely weighted. Very elegant looking with clean lines. Have purchased other decanters through etsy but the quality just wasn't what i was hoping for. These are all glass, and you can tell immediately that the quality is more on the high-end side of decanters.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great quality decanter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my boyfriend for Christmas. He has been wanting one of these for years. I was very impressed at how it came packaged. There is obviously some thought put into the packaging to make sure it all comes in one piece. It also was delivered pretty quickly after ordering. I would definitely order from this company again in the future and would recommend this decanter if you are looking. It is heavy glass, which I am pleased with, and it seems it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Moses

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!!!! highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and she looooooved it. She's very into her scotch and couldn't believe how fancy it was. For the gift giver: it comes in great packaging (not gift wrap more like product packaging.)
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My buyers absolutely Loved this gift!!! It was so classy and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautiful presentation
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful presentation, good craftsmanship, quality crystal. It’s a gift and I’m sure he will love it! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, arrived in very nice packaging. Received as a birthday gift and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: jarheadjer

customer_reviews.title: Its Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my husband for our 3 year anniversary. He was so happy! Its so pretty and the cups are so perfect. Its a little hard to pour, but I would imagine any decanter like that would be a little awkward to hold and pour. A great product for a great price! It came in a leather box with a white slip, looks so fancy. I loved it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tara H.

customer_reviews.title: Not great..
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband for anniversary he liked it very much. I was not impressed with the quality of the crystal had some air bubbles and did not look high quality. Packaging looked like several people had returned the product the sponge where the cups sit was torn in several spots and box was smashed on one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Prada chrome colone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he was so impressed! The glasses are good weight and they sit well in your hand. Everything looks really nice and the packaging is impressive. The only thing he wasn’t happy about was the gift caught him off guard because he didn’t have anything he considered good enough to fill the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gift set! Well presented, heavy, classy! I cannot say enough nice things about this set. Purchased as a gift for our son in law, but will be buying more for my son and hubby. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kris E. Hollon

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, packaging was ruined.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself appears that it will be good to use. However, the packaging was in shambles - since it was a gift, it was a bit hokey giving a gift that looked like it was bought from someones garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set - sadly a glass was broken I reached out to the customer service department and they sent a replacement glass for us instantly! 5 stars for customer service and quality
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Chic classic elegance
customer_reviews.text: The cut of the decanter sparkles in the light like cut glass. A timeless accessory for any bar. This was a gift for a friend that was well received and truly becomes a topic of conversation. Subtle class without being overstated. Fabulous purchase
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful decanter set! Only issue was when it was first opened all the glass was foggy so after a quick wash it was clear and beautiful! Nice and heavy very impressive for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful art deco design and the glasses and decanter are sturdy and durable. It comes in a nice presentation case, mine arrived on time in perfect condition. Would make a great gift for any spirits lover.
customer_reviews.author: Dharmabum

customer_reviews.title: As Expected But
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged But, The glass was dirty and had smudges on them? I had to clean the glasses before giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: V Li

customer_reviews.title: Premium Decanter Set
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this decanter set. The $100 price tag may be off putting for some; nevertheless the presentation and quality is impeccable!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Harrison

customer_reviews.title: “Sizzle”
customer_reviews.text: The decanter and glasses have “sizzle”! I was very surprised how sharp they look! The decanter fits really nice on my wine rack. A great addition to my bar. The glasses have a nice weight and add “a touch of class” as well. I’m very happy with my purchase. I would highly recommend buying this fine set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is even better in person. I can not wait to give this as a gift. The quality is outstanding along with the box and presentation. I actually want one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: deep diver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Elegant and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday and he absolutely LOVED it! I did too. It looks very elegant and you can feel that it's of great quality. The glasses were a little bigger than I expected but that's definitely not an issue! I also loved the package it was in, I didn't have to get gift wrapping for it, it was already perfectly packaged and ready for him to open as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this set. Great design, quality, and storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Hillius

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Received my packaged and opened it and only to find that I didn’t not receive the cap of the decanter. It was a birthday gift and it was embarrassing having the person open it for their birthday and there’s a piece missing. Don’t get me wrong but this is a very nice gift but it just wasn’t packaged properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alvarado Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for an experienced whiskey drinker and he liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the quality - very heavy. Bought this as a gift for an experienced whiskey drinker and he liked it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Haleh

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this set, and loved the value, as far as gifting it, yeah, no, this set is all mine. I’ve only had the set for two days so I can’t really comment on how durable it is; I can only hope that I don’t have to test that theory. A must if you enjoy nice things.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, elegance, value.
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! It’s so elegant. I believe that it looks better in person than in the pictures. I was impressed by the packaging as well. I definitely recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Sparkle
customer_reviews.text: It shines brilliantly. Everything was amazing. I will say, though: The exterior cardboard box that contained the "Maketh the Man" box was awfully beat up. So much so that I took pictures of the shipping box before opening it in case any glass was shattered. But, all in all, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, value and custom service the way it should be. I will look for more products from this family business
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but arrived dirty and damaged
customer_reviews.text: So I like this set. However, my set arrived dusty, dirty, ripped, water stained and with a strong chemical odor. I ordered this for a wedding that i am planning to attend this weekend. So all my time spend planning the perfect set with tags and whiskey bottle is busted. I have to find another set pronto. Smh. I'm disappointed because the set is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: vogue jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. Bought this as a gift for my husband and he just loves them.
customer_reviews.author: jmchicago

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for my aunt and uncle, thought it looked nice in the photos. Opened it and was blown away by it, everything from the box to the glasses are beautiful. Kinda wanted to keep it for myself (^_^)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality and brilliant design
customer_reviews.text: Got as a retirement gift for a friend and will have engraved at a later time. Very impressed with the ruggedness and durability. Perfect to have in your home and should replace all other decanter sets you may currently have. Will get one of my own at soonest opportunity!
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in a beautiful package - but the glass was all filthy. Had it been clean and sparkling it would have been 5 stars all the way. Customer Service was AWEFUL. Probably would not recommend based on that.
customer_reviews.author: Soozie

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my son-in-law. I can truly say, this is stunning, sturdy, and comes in the most beautiful box. The note from the MTM company, just reinforced the quality and mindset of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and classy set
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this set. It’s beautifully packaged in a substantial box which can be used for storage as well. The glasses themselves are heavy and well made. This is a great gift for a fan of Ironman since it’s an exact replica of the set used by Tony Stark.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetfx81

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decanter and glasses. A couple of small air bubbles, but nothing that would be noticeable except under close examination.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy barker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful presentation. It’s going to look like you spent a couple hundred dollars. Great gift for a boss or whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Santana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design...Quality is worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! This decanter set didn’t disappoint my boyfriend at all. The gold and black box packaging is beautiful...we didn’t want to get rid of it. For the glass quality of this set/craftsmanship, it is well worth the money and I would order this sleek set again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for decanter set... this is it!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a decanter set, this is it!! Had it engraved for my boyfriends birthday. He loved it! Get quality and workmanship!! Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany M

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn’t do it justice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas for my son in law. He loved it! The way it was packaged was very well done let alone presentation and quality of the set! Buy it you’ll love it! I’m going to have my wife buy me one!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gibson

customer_reviews.title: 100% real talk, non paid review
customer_reviews.text: These jokers are dope! Got them for the FIL, he was stoked! So was i when they arrived! Came in a Nice box that held up during shipping .... snag it for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and ordered myself one. Both arrived in excellent shape and in packaging worthy of the price point. There are a few pin point size air bubbles...which are not noticeable at first glance, but upon further examination, you can see the imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: billy425

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband as a Christmas present. It was packaged beautifully and securely. The glasses are thick enough to be durable and not chip easily. The masculine design was perfect for my husband to put in the study.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Faris

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set! Great quality and phenomenal customer service. First set arrived with the decanter cracked, contacted customer service and was promptly taken care of with a replacement. I absolutely love it and my friends are constantly commenting on the quality of the glass. You will not be disappointed with this decanter set.
customer_reviews.author: L. White

customer_reviews.title: Hands down 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: These glasses arrived today with no breakage and no defects. These glasses arrived with every piece in the set, decanter and 4 glasses. The glasses have some weight on them and unless you have smaller than the average hand I can see how these might be difficult to drink out of. There are absolutely no visual defects. These are stunning pieces I would recommend as a gift or if you want something unique for the home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: ... as a law school graduation gift and my friend LOVED IT. Beautifully packaged and a beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a law school graduation gift and my friend LOVED IT. Beautifully packaged and a beautiful set. Looking forward to seeing it used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: They shipped it so securely and so padded there was not a scratch on it. It is so beautiful and elegant - looks even better with a nice bourbon in it. My husband LOVES it - he thinks he is Ray Donovan now with his fancy decanter. Everyone who comes by our house comments how lovely it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a fine quality item that is perfectly giftable, which is the reason I purchased it. After opening it to verify it made it intact, I am very tempted to purchase my own for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Now THAT’s a “man” gift! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Classic look and solid product. Gave it as a very special birthday gift. Now I want to buy a set for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: R. P.

customer_reviews.title: Solid well built decanter set that looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this decanter set, a solid well built set that looks great
customer_reviews.author: ryan carlson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific quality for the price ... high value
customer_reviews.text: Great value you won’t find higher quality crystal for the money... love it
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cocktail enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets, 1 for the best man at my wedding and another for myself. Beautifuly cut glasses. The weight is perfect, really classes up your cocktail. I have bourbon in my decanter and everyone comments about how pretty/cool it looks on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: joey wildes

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. The glasses are a bit big but whatever. It still looks fantastic. The box in cane in is a s nice as the set. Not sure what to do with the box now. It’s too nice to toss away.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Newman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Experience
customer_reviews.text: The product is beautiful and with great quality. The producer not only takes care of a glamorous presentation but makes the customer experience great. Thank for your card!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning!!! Even the packaging is nice!! My husband loved it! I'll be looking into more of there products!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Antunez

customer_reviews.title: Best Whiskey Set On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you that this set is awesome. Nice clean cut glasses, personally the decanter is my favorite. Such an elegant design, you can put it in the cabinet or just leave it near the bar area as decor, either way you can’t go wrong purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: This product was so great that I ordered one for both of my sons. They love the decanter and glasses. High quality, heavy plus they look great on the bar!
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts and they came in a beautiful box and packaged very securely. My son and fiancé were so thrilled when they opened these. This is one very classy gift and I will buy more when the opportunity arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Came in a super high end box and looks beautiful. Very well made, and the interior of the box insured it didn't break before it arrived. The case itself got beat up before it arrived. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: BoredAF!!##.com

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but fancy
customer_reviews.text: Came in a fansy box. It’s too pricy but looks good if you are expecting important guests home.
customer_reviews.author: Karma Karma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I opened the box and was blown away by the beautiful packing, but was even happier with the product. Wonderful design, nice weight. Can’t wait to use this at the next family get together!
customer_reviews.author: Saya 92

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a 30th Birthday Present for my Son
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift to my Son for his 30th Birthday! He absolutely loved it! Luckily he got it as a present from me, because his friends know his love for a good glass of Bourbon or Scotch. He received 3 bottles of Bourbon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Premium Art Deco Whiskey Decanter And Glass Set. 27oz Scotch Decanter In Unique Stylish Gift Box. Bourbon Decanter For Men. Genuine Lead Free Crystal Liquor Decanters For Alcohol Designed In Europe.
feature_bullets: YOU’LL FEEL AMAZING GIVING THIS WHISKEY DECANTER SET AS A GIFT - This unique drinkware comes packaged and protected in our exquisite presentation box, making gift wrapping optional. Impress the enthusiast in your life and watch their face light up when they open their present to reveal this beautiful decanter and tumblers. Perfect as a groomsman gift or for any occasion such as anniversary, birthday, Father's Day, engagement or wedding. Treat yourself or gift to someone special.

STUNNING HIGH QUALITY 5-PIECE SET WITH TIMELESS EUROPEAN DESIGN – Made with exceptional craftsmanship and care, Maketh The Man lead-free crystal exudes luxury and style. We blend timeless design with a contemporary twist to bring you glassware that is refined and sophisticated. You can feel the weight and old-fashioned quality in your hand.

GENEROUS CAPACITY TO STORE ALCOHOL AND ENJOY YOUR FAVORITE DRINK – This stylish 27 oz (800 ml) liquor decanter comes with four matching glasses. The 10 oz (300 ml) tumblers are perfect if you want to savor more than one shot of your best whiskey, scotch, bourbon or rum with ample room for water, ice, ice ball, whisky stones or rocks. They are also ideal for your brandy or other spirits and mixers. The glasses have a solid base so are perfect for making cocktails such as an Old Fashioned.

LEAD-FREE PERFECTLY SAFE FOR EVERYDAY USE AND FOR YOUR PEACE OF MIND – Unlike traditional crystal, our entire drinkware range is beautifully crafted from 100% non-leaded crystal. Thus allowing you to safely store your best bottle and savor every sip. This stylish glassware is also durable and dishwasher safe.

YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED SO YOU CAN ORDER WITH CONFIDENCE – Our brand values are Quality, Trust and Integrity so all of our products come with a 100% satisfaction guarantee and friendly customer service.
